# The `ICmpInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This instruction compares its operands according to the predicate given to the constructor. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ICmpInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This instruction compares its operands according to the predicate given to the constructor.

It only operates on integers or pointers. The operands must be identical types. Represent an integer comparison operator.

Definition at line 1158 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

### hasSameSign() {#a1c3d1a0d43200a0336d30721a12d981b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::ICmpInst::hasSameSign () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
An icmp instruction, which can be marked as &quot;samesign&quot;, indicating that the two operands have the same sign.

This means that we can convert &quot;slt&quot; to &quot;ult&quot; and vice versa, which enables more optimizations.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l01281">1281</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>

</SectionUser>

### swapOperands() {#acbc778ccd1faf4e95963c9a980acc7a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::ICmpInst::swapOperands ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Exchange the two operands to this instruction in such a way that it does not modify the semantics of the instruction.

The predicate value may be changed to retain the same result if the predicate is order dependent (e.g. ult). Swap operands and adjust predicate.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l01348">1348</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
